entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then periods of snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
